backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining tournament stages and groups with add/get operations using Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence list mapping UI changes to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend tournament modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS with light and dark mode CSS variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level component selecting which tournament page to render based on current view.
frontend/src/components/AdvancementConfi: Dialog for configuring where winners and runner-ups advance in multi-stage robin rounds.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Shared layout wrapper with page container and footer attribution.
frontend/src/components/KnockoutPairingE: Editor for configuring first-round knockout pairings with auto/manual modes and validation.
frontend/src/components/KnockoutWinnerSe: Component for selecting winners in knockout matches, hidden when placeholders are present.
frontend/src/components/MatchDateTimeEdi: Small editor component letting users update a match's date and time through controlled inputs and store updates.
frontend/src/components/RoundRobinGroupT: Displays and edits round‑robin groups, supporting team renaming, reordering, and group name editing with validation.
frontend/src/components/Stage2GroupAssig: Shows a visual preview of how teams advance between round‑robin stages using configured destinations.
Exports a stage’s groups and basic metadata to a downloadable JSON file.
frontend/src/features/tournament/generat: Generates all round‑robin stages, groups, and matches, and deterministically advances teams to subsequent stages.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupNa: Produces Excel‑style alphabetical group names for an arbitrary index.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupRe: Reorders teams within a group by moving a team to a target position while keeping positions unique.
frontend/src/features/tournament/knockou: Generates fixture codes for knockout matches and determines a match’s index within its round.
Builds knockout brackets from qualified teams, handling seeding, pairing modes, and round creation with warnings.
Provides utilities to detect, normalize, and display placeholder team names for knockout fixtures.
Implements reseeding logic by scoring bracket permutations to avoid rematches and generating related warnings.
Defines canonical knockout round names, ordering, and helpers for round validation and lookup.
Propagates winners through knockout brackets using fixture references and updates downstream match participants.
frontend/src/features/tournament/matchCo: Calculates match totals for round-robin and knockout stages, including detailed per-stage breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/tournament/originG: Resolves a team's earliest group-origin serial and formats team names with that prefix.
frontend/src/features/tournament/qualifi: Determines which teams qualify for knockout stages based on advancement rules and counts qualified teams.
frontend/src/features/tournament/roundRo: Computes display codes for round-robin teams and formats names using group position or origin serial.
Generates all pairwise round-robin matches for a group within a stage.
frontend/src/features/tournament/types.t: Defines TypeScript types for teams, groups, matches, stages, advancement rules, knockout configuration, and overall tournament state.
frontend/src/features/tournament/useTour: Implements a Zustand store managing tournament state, updates, generation, knockout logic, and migration of match source references.
frontend/src/features/tournament/validat: Provides validation utilities for team counts, round configs, advancement rules, date/time formats, and formatting of advancement labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for authentication, identity loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing, reserved for future backend query integrations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/FullSchedulePage.tsx: Displays the full tournament schedule with knockout rounds, team formatting, navigation actions, and winner selection UI.
frontend/src/pages/KnockoutPage.tsx: Renders knockout-stage matches, handles winner selection and reset actions, and formats team display using origin group serials or placeholder labels.
frontend/src/pages/StageSchedulePage.tsx: Displays all round-robin stages with editable groups, navigation actions, and a reset confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentSetupPage.t: Provides UI for configuring team counts, round-robin rounds, advancement rules, and generating or resetting the tournament.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, fonts, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature requirements, and notes about display-only updates for showing origin group serials.
